title: Capturing the Beauty of a Misty Morning on Canvas
body: I've been trying to capture the magic of a foggy morning in a painting. The mist creates such an ethereal atmosphere. Any artists here who specialize in landscapes or atmospheric paintings?

title: A Brush with Darkness: Exploring the Power of Shadow in Art
body: I've been experimenting with using shadows in my artwork to create contrast and mood. There's something about playing with light and dark that brings so much emotion to a piece. Anyone else enjoy working with shadow in their art?
